thread.title: Shopping trip to NYC
thread.title_full: Shopping trip to NYC - Review of Soho Grand Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: SarahMaryB
title: Shopping trip to NYC
text: Absolutely love this hotel and cannot fault it! Have stayed here twice (April 2016 & sept 2016) always had a great experience. Rooms come with the most incredible views and breathtaking sunrise! (if you get the view over the soho mews direction) defeat cocktails , selection at breakfast is unbeatable, staff always so so friendly. Love it !
